name: Fall of The Humans
description:
The extinction of the human race is near. Introducing, The evil Dr. Metro he's built a galactic robot army to get revenge on the human race. It's up to our heroes Jose and his group to save their friends and the world from human extinction. It all Goes wrong when Dr. Metro takes his friends Madai, Janie, Ismenia, and Martin. So it's up to Jose and Mia to work together and stop the evil Dr. Metro from taking over the world...

How to save and keep the save file on Mobile:

To save on Mobile devices download a 3rd party browser Chrome, Opera, Brave etc on your phone and play the game that way 

for some reason the default browser provided on your phone Safari/Google only save the game for a limited time but through Chrome the save is there in definite Note this has been tested on Private browsers Brave/Opera and works the same way 

More information about the game

Controls

PC:

Movement: Arrow keys, Num pad

Action: Z, Enter, Space or walk up to it

Cancel: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Menu: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Dash: Shift

Previous Page: Q, Page Up

Next Page: W, Page Down

Scroll Pages: Arrow Keys, Num pad

Xbox Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: A

Cancel: B

Menu: Y

Dash: X

Previous Page: LB

Next Page: RB

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Playstation Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: X button

Cancel: Circle

Menu: Triangle

Dash: Square

Previous Page: L1

Next Page: R1

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Mobile Controls:

Movement: Tap destination *2

Action: Tap target

Cancel: Tap with two fingers

Menu: Tap with two fingers

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Tap and hold as you swipe from inside of page to outside of page.

Mouse:

Movement: Click destination *2

Action: Click Target

Cancel: Right Click

Menu: Right Click

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Drag from inside of page to outside of page/mouse scroll wheel

Known Bugs and Fixes

Text load Bug: If the text in the game does not load then refresh the page and load from a auto save file.
